original: Yassa yattha kāyasaṅkhāro nirujjhati tassa tattha vacīsaṅkhāro nirujjhatīti? …pe…. (Yassakampi yassayatthakampi sadisaṁ.)

corrected: yassa yattha kāya saṅkhāro nirujjhati tassa tattha vacī saṅkhāro nirujjhati iti pe yassa kampi yassa yattha kampi sadisaṁ

original: Yattha kāyasaṅkhāro na nirujjhati …pe….
analyzed: kāya saṅkhāraḥ na nirujjhati pe
corrected: Yattha kāya saṅkhāraḥ na nirujjhati pe
